answers.answer: I was excited to get mine too. 10 days left (in 3 hours).
lol are you having a boy or girl?

question: i went on the app on my phone and the baby arrival button was there!! im 36 + 1 today and i go for an ultrasound first thing in the morning so we can see just how big our little man is, hes been 2 weeks ahead the whole time .. then for the strep b and monitoring of his heart rate starts twice this coming week. but no diabetes or high bp thank goodness. if it shows hes stressing were looking at being induced early
title: baby arrival button!
